sections.title: Cavalier (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Cavalier class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Cavalier)
sections.description: Cavaliers are proficient with all simple and martial weapons, all types of armor (heavy, light, and medium), and shields except tower shields.

sections.title: Challenge ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: As a swift action, the cavalier can challenge a foe to gain bonus damage equal to cavalier level on melee attacks against that target, but takes -2 AC penalty except against the challenged target.

sections.title: Mount ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: The cavalier gains a loyal mount that functions as a druid's animal companion using cavalier level as effective druid level, with special training and armor proficiency bonuses.

sections.title: Order ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: The cavalier must pledge to a specific order at 1st level, gaining bonuses, class skills, and special abilities, but must follow the order's edicts or lose challenge benefits for 24 hours.

sections.title: Tactician ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: The cavalier gains a bonus teamwork feat and can grant it to allies within 30 feet as a standard action for 3 rounds plus 1 round per 2 levels.

sections.title: Cavalier’s Charge ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: While mounted, the cavalier gains +4 bonus on charge attack rolls instead of +2 and suffers no AC penalty after charging.

sections.title: Expert Trainer ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: The cavalier gains a bonus equal to half his level on Handle Animal checks for mounts and can reduce training time by increasing DC.

sections.title: Banner ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: The cavalier's visible banner grants allies within 60 feet a +2 morale bonus on saves against fear and +1 morale bonus on charge attack rolls, with bonuses increasing every 5 levels.

sections.title: Bonus Feat (Cavalier)
sections.description: The cavalier gains a bonus combat feat at 6th level and every six levels thereafter.

sections.title: Greater Tactician ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: The cavalier gains an additional teamwork feat and can use the tactician ability as a swift action instead of standard action.

sections.title: Mighty Charge ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: While mounted and charging, the cavalier doubles weapon threat range and can make a free combat maneuver if the charge attack succeeds.

sections.title: Demanding Challenge ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: The cavalier's challenge target takes a -2 AC penalty against attacks from anyone other than the cavalier while within the cavalier's threatened area.

sections.title: Greater Banner ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: The banner grants +2 morale bonus on saves against charm and compulsion effects, and the cavalier can wave it to grant allies additional saves against ongoing effects.

sections.title: Master Tactician ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: The cavalier gains another teamwork feat and can grant any two of his known teamwork feats when using the tactician ability.

sections.title: Supreme Charge ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Cavalier)
sections.description: Mounted charge attacks deal double damage (triple with lance), and critical hits on charges can stun the target for 1d4 rounds.

sections.title: Tactical Genius (Ex) (Cavalier)
sections.description: The cavalier gains another teamwork feat, can grant up to three feats with tactician, and increases tactician range by 90 feet.
